content: sox on the beach designed by adrienne fong i really enjoy playing with yarns that stripe the lace adds just a bit of fun sparkle and playfulness so grab a pitcher of your favorite umbrella drink sit in the sun and enjoy some sox on the beach size woman s small 7 ankle med 8 ankle large 9 ankle materials 100 gm fingering weight sock yarn us size 1 2 25 mm for small/medium or to knit to gauge us size 1 5 2 5mm for large or to knit to gauge stitch markers tapestry needle gauge 9 5 sts/inch & 14 row/inch in stockinette for small/medium sizes 8 5 sts/inch & 12 row/inch in stockinette for large size finished size for medium 7 3/4 leg circumference blocked and relaxed 7 1/2 foot circumference blocked and relaxed 6 leg length notes for large size knit the medium size with us size 1 5 2 5mm needles when two numbers are given the first applies to the small size and the second to the medium size the size of the sock can be adjusted by using a smaller or larger needle for a knit with
